remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制引發事件時編輯 按鈕 (具有按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Edit") 按下時前,控制項進入編輯模式。The control raises the event when an Edit button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Edit") is clicked, but before the control enters edit mode. 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消編輯作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the edit operation, whenever this event occurs. A物件傳遞給事件處理方法，後者則可讓您決定要編輯的資料列的索引，並指出應該取消編輯作業。A object is passed to the event-handling method, which allows you to determine the index of the row being edited and to indicate that the edit operation should be canceled. 若要取消的編輯作業，請設定屬性物件`true`。To cancel the edit operation, set the property of the object to `true`. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用物件傳遞至事件處理方法，以取消編輯作業，如果使用者嘗試編輯包含作者與最後一個名稱空白的資料列。The following example demonstrates how to use the object passed to the event-handling method to cancel the editing operation if the user attempts to edit a row that contains an author with the last name White.
